inclusion.criterion: abdominal pain characteristic of acute pancreatitis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: serum amylase and/or lipase greater than 3 times the upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients are excluded from the study if they do not meet the criteria for acute pancreatitis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are under the age of 16
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41-year-old obese woman presenting with abdominal pain and vomiting, diagnosed with acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis.
